chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_198
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
ga Sessions: Invite the pregnant women to yoga sessions at HWC-SHC
47
Hypertension  ∙ At least 4 servings of calcium-rich foods like dairy products (milk, paneer, curd), soya 
milk, whole pulses, whole cereals, green leafy vegetables and ragi/nuts
 ∙ Potassium-rich foods like ragi, wheat, Bengal gram, cowpea, moong, peas, red gram, 
colocassia, coriander seeds, fenugreek seeds, musambi, apricots, banana, cherries, etc. 
 ∙ Small and frequent meals should be taken
 ∙ Avoid fasting or missing any
